items.sentence: I don't think that anyone really thought Tom was happy.
I don't think that anybody really thought Tom was busy.
In addition to being a doctor, Dr. Jackson is a writer.
I couldn't concentrate on my work because of the noise.
There's more water in the red cup than in the blue one.
A seed can remain viable for centuries, even millennia.
Mary ironed the shirts and forgot to turn off the iron.
Don't ever challenge someone who's got nothing to lose.
It'll be difficult to do that with your arm in a sling.
Nobody knows just how many people died in the accident.
Life is what happens when you're busy with other plans.
You don't need to pay anything. Today, dinner is on me.
If the weather's good, we'll go for a walk in the park.
You have excellent vision. Why are you wearing glasses?
The idea was excellent, but the execution was terrible.
Go to the supermarket and buy us enough to last a week.
Have I ever told you about the time Tom went to Boston?
Tom sold all of his land and gave the money to charity.
I'll tell you if you promise me that you won't get mad.
My father makes it a rule to take a walk every morning.
